item.ptxt: Use the same procedures for the RH side and LH side.
The procedures listed below are for the LH side.
A bolt without a torque specification is shown in the standard bolt chart (see page ).

s-1.ptxt: TEMPORARILY INSTALL FRONT LOWER SUSPENSION ARM SUB-ASSEMBLY LH

s2.ptxt: Temporarily install the lower arm with the 2 camber adjusting cams, No. 1 and No. 2 camber adjusting cams and 2 nuts.
Align the matchmarks on the No. 1 camber adjusting cam and No. 2 camber adjusting cam. Temporarily tighten the nuts.
Install the ball joint attachment with the nut and a new cotter pin.
Connect the ball joint attachment with the 2 bolts.
Using SST, install the front spring bumper to the lower arm.

s-1.ptxt: TEMPORARILY INSTALL FRONT SHOCK ABSORBER WITH COIL SPRING

s2.ptxt: Install the shock absorber with coil spring with the bolt, and temporarily install the nut.

s-1.ptxt: CONNECT FRONT STABILIZER LINK ASSEMBLY LH

s2.ptxt: Connect the stabilizer link to the lower arm with the nut.

atten4.ptxt: If the ball joint turns together with the nut, use a 6 mm hexagon wrench to hold the stud in place.

s-1.ptxt: CONNECT FRONT SPEED SENSOR LH (w/ ABS)

s2.ptxt: Install the 2 harness clamps with the 2 bolts.

item.ptxt: When installing the clamp, do not twist the wire harness.
Make sure the clamp rotation stopper touches the installation position.

s2.ptxt: Install the speed sensor with the bolt.

item.ptxt: Make sure there are no pieces of iron or other foreign matter attached to the sensor tip.
While inserting the speed sensor into the knuckle hole, do not strike or damage the sensor tip.
After installing the speed sensor, make sure there is no clearance or foreign matter between the sensor stay part and the knuckle.
When installing the sensor, do not twist the wire harness.

s2.ptxt: Install the harness clamp with the bolt.

item.ptxt: When installing the clamp, do not twist the wire harness.
Make sure the clamp rotation stopper touches the installation position.

s2.ptxt: Install the harness clamp with the bolt.

item.ptxt: When installing the clamp, do not twist the wire harness.
Make sure the clamp rotation stopper touches the installation position.
Do not attach the connector to the radiator fan shroud before connecting the connector.

s2.ptxt: Attach the 2 clamps and the connector.

atten3.ptxt: When attaching the clamps, do not twist the wire harness.

s2.ptxt: Press down on the vehicle several times to stabilize the suspension.

s-1.ptxt: TIGHTEN FRONT LOWER SUSPENSION ARM SUB-ASSEMBLY LH
TIGHTEN FRONT SHOCK ABSORBER WITH COIL SPRING

s2.ptxt: Fix the nut in place and tighten the bolt.

s-1.ptxt: INSPECT AND ADJUST FRONT WHEEL ALIGNMENT
